pages.text: You have reached a level of Insight which grants you knowledge of $(#00a800)communing with the gods$() of this world, known as the $(#5454fc)Guardians$(). In order to do this, you must first make a $(#00a8a8)Summoning Altar$().

Next, you will $(6)right click certain ingredients onto the altar$(). They will remain there until removed, or until the ritual is complete. Once you have the necessary reagents, $(6)right click with the$() $(#00a8a8)Catalyst$(), an item which indicates that you are beginning the ritual.

The $(#00a8a8)Summoning Altar$() provides a conduit for the Guardians to listen to you and respond. It's not known exactly how this works, but you'll need to be $(#00a800)very clear$() about your requests for information, or you'll get no response.
